ygData.subject: Re: Ok, now what? (spoilers)
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye dont just sit around waiting on the Hero, do more randome killing and he will show up more often. A good idea is to just pound on the Drakes and what not
ygData.messageBody:
Aye dont just sit around waiting on the Hero, do more randome killing and he
will show up more often.

A good idea is to just pound on the Drakes and what not as well, the more
normal spawn creatures that are "Bashed" the more rare spawn creatures show
up.

Hope that helps

Uglugg, Troll Shada Knight of Bristalbane


>From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>
>Princess Xaera wrote:
>>
>> From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>
>>
>> I'm not sure if this is broken or not (maybe just on our server), but we
did
>> that for 12 hours straight over 2 days and the mino hero never spawned.
>>
>> So I don't know what's up with that.
>>
>> X.
>
>Hmm. I saw him twice in a 3 hour period when I got my shackle.
>Perhaps you need to find something to do, like kill gnome guards, or
>just camp Meldrath for exp, and hope he shows up. Actually waiting
>for something to spawn influences how long it will take for them to
>spawn I think. Quantum interactions and such ;)
>
>Xilith
>
